name: Cosmic Cleaner (itch)
description:
Now using post-LD38 build. Do not rate.

WINDOWS DOWNLOAD AVAILABLE AS A WEBGL ALTERNATIVE. (some users had low framerates on the html5 version)

ASTEROID PLACEMENT MATTERS!

  1. PLACE THE ASTEROID AT THE FRONT OF THE BATTING AREA TO HIT IT DOWNWARDS
  2. PLACE THE ASTEROID AT THE BACK OF THE BATTING AREA TO HIT IT UPWARDS
  3. MIDDLE PLACEMENT MAKES IT GO STRAIGHT (no way!)
  4. HOLD SPACEBAR TO SKIP PANNING ACROSS LEVEL WHEN YOU MESS UP
  5. You don't have to swing with full power! Release space early to hit it lightly!
  6. The red 'X' is where you last attempted to hit from! It's NOT A HINT! If it was wrong before, it's still wrong on the next try!

It's time to clean up the universe!

Wack the asteroids into the black holes while using the incredibly (in)accurate physics of planetary gravity to assist you

Don't hit the planets unless you want to wipe out entire civilizations, in which case this may not be the game for you!
